arts.ttl: Serie A: Cagliari vs. Monza – Confirmed line-ups and updates
arts.sum: The line-ups are in for the first Serie A fixture on Sunday’s schedule, as Cagliari...

Cagliari are unbeaten in each of their last seven home matches against Monza between Serie A and Serie B, winning two games and drawing five from 1984 onwards. Cagliari and Monza have met three times in Serie A, winning a game eachh (D1); the Brianzoli have found the net in each of those three meetings.
